mapper.select: SELECT INDV_SCHD_NUM , WRITER , PROJ_ID , INDV_SCHD_TITLE , INDV_SCHD_CTS , INDV_SCHD_STRT_DATE , INDV_SCHD_END_DATE , INDV_SCHD_WRITE_DATE , DELETE_YN FROM INDV_SCHD WHERE DELETE_YN = 'n'

SELECT TASK_ID, PROJ_ID, MEM_CODE, HIGH_TASK_ID, TASK_TITLE, TASK_CTS , TASK_STRT_DATE, TASK_END_DATE, TASK_STUS_CODE, TASK_PGRES, LOW_RGST_SEQ , APROV_WHTH, TASK_REPRE, DELETE_YN, REFER_CTS FROM TASK WHERE MEM_CODE = 'M002' AND DELETE_YN = 'n' AND APROV_WHTH = 'y'
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(INDV_SCHD_NUM),0)+1 FROM INDV_SCHD
INSERT INTO INDV_SCHD(INDV_SCHD_NUM,WRITER,PROJ_ID,INDV_SCHD_TITLE,INDV_SCHD_CTS,INDV_SCHD_STRT_DATE,INDV_SCHD_END_DATE,INDV_SCHD_WRITE_DATE,DELETE_YN) VALUES(#{indvSchdNum},'M002','P005',#{indvSchdTitle},#{indvSchdCts},#{indvSchdStrtDate},#{indvSchdEndDate},sysdate,'n')
mapper.update: UPDATE INDV_SCHD SET INDV_SCHD_TITLE=#{indvSchdTitle}, INDV_SCHD_CTS=#{indvSchdCts}, INDV_SCHD_STRT_DATE=#{indvSchdStrtDate}, INDV_SCHD_END_DATE=#{indvSchdEndDate} WHERE WRITER = 'M002' AND INDV_SCHD_NUM = #{indvSchdNum}
